title: More logical processing is expected when sorting data on disk with border values for row value
OB: When sorting data on disk with a sort on 40,000 rows of data, and the program is set to process data less than 40,000 rows, the following operation occurs:
SR: 1. Set up a test environment with at least 40,000 rows of data to be sorted on disk. 2. Configure the program to process data less than 40,000 rows. 3. Initiate the sorting process on disk. 4. Observe the behavior of the program during the sorting operation with the specified border value for the row value.
